a.span: Monomoy Regional School District names Adam O’Shea as new middle school principal

div.p: A hiring committee comprised of administrators, teachers, parents, a counselor, a student, and a community member unanimously selected current Monomoy Regional Middle School Assistant Principal Adam O’Shea.

a.title: Go to comments for Monomoy Regional School District names Adam O’Shea as new middle school principal

img.alt: MRSD launches Sharks on Wheels in addition to its Grab and Go free meals program

a.span: MRSD launches Sharks on Wheels in addition to its Grab and Go free meals program

div.p: Meal delivery service for families unable to travel will be added to existing Grab and Go meal program.

a.title: Go to comments for MRSD launches Sharks on Wheels in addition to its Grab and Go free meals program

a.span: Monomoy Middle School STEM Lab fires up 3D printers to produce medical gear for pandemic response

div.p: MRMS STEM teacher Matt Barnes is using the school's 3D printers to create safety gear for health-care professionals.

a.title: Go to comments for Monomoy Middle School STEM Lab fires up 3D printers to produce medical gear for pandemic response

span.p: Ad Lucem (“toward the light”) is the underlying principle that guides our district and all of our students, teachers, and staff.
This is represented in our annual high school graduation award -- click here for the history, criteria, and past recipients of the Ad Lucem Award.

div.p: Address 425 Crowell Road, 2nd Floor, Chatham, MA 02633
